head.title: Brenda C. Harper Marries in Paris

hedline.hl1: Brenda C. Harper Marries in Paris

block.p: Brenda Christian Harper, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John C. Harper of Weston, Conn., was married yesterday at the American Cathedral in Paris to Marc Robert Vandamme, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Robert E. Vandamme of Lille, France. The Rev. Benjamin Shambaugh, an Episcopal priest, and the Rev. Joseph Chone, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony.
The bride is a vice president in the international private banking department of J. P. Morgan in Paris. She graduated from Harvard University.

Brenda Christian Harper, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John C. Harper of Weston, Conn., was married yesterday at the American Cathedral in Paris to Marc Robert Vandamme, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Robert E. Vandamme of Lille, France. The Rev. Benjamin Shambaugh, an Episcopal priest, and the Rev. Joseph Chone, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony.
The bride is a vice president in the international private banking department of J. P. Morgan in Paris. She graduated from Harvard University.
Mr. Vandamme founded and heads a computer sales concern in Paris. He graduated from LEcole Centrale de Paris and received his M.B.A. degree from the University of Pennsylvania.
